headline: In Stunning Step, Duke and Duchess Seek New Title: Part-Timers
abstract: The couple said they plan to split time between Britain and North America, with Canada seen as a likely landing spot.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — In a year of gut punches to Britain’s royal family, Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, delivered a jarring blow of their own on Wednesday, announcing that they would “step back” from their official duties.
